content:
Based on the information you provided, the hiring manager for the Rippling role is likely looking for an Account Executive who can:

1. Demonstrate experience managing a high volume of inbound leads and a willingness to make 20-25 calls per month to engaged prospects.
2. Show a track record of successfully navigating a strategic sales process with a 45-day deal time.
3. Prove an ability to consistently meet or exceed a monthly quota of $80,000.
4. Demonstrate strong organizational and time management skills to effectively prioritize and manage a high volume of inbound leads.
5. Exhibit a solid understanding of HRIS/HCM software and security-related products, as well as the ability to become an expert in the Rippling platform.
6. Show a passion for helping businesses streamline their HR and IT processes.
7. Demonstrate excellent communication skills and an ability to deliver compelling sales presentations and product demos.
8. Possess a deep understanding of the competitor landscape and the ability to position Rippling as a superior solution.
9. Prove an ability to work collaboratively with the customer success team to ensure a seamless transition for new customers.
10. Demonstrate a commitment to continuous learning and development to stay up-to-date on industry trends and new product features.
